DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate potential effect artemether- lumefantrine auditory function
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Potential Effect Artemether - Lumefantrine Malaria Drugs Auditory Function
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 12 year age old Accepts Healthy Volunteers P. falciparum parasitemia 1,000 100,000 parasites/μl History fever presence fever ( temperature ≥ 37.5°C ) Exclusion Criteria Signs/symptoms severe/complicated malaria Ingestion various antimalarial drug , antibiotic previous 2 week 2 month History drugrelated hear impairment Abnormal hearing function study entry Exposure sustain loud noise , selfreport , within past 24 hour Present ear problem Pregnant lactating ( urine test βHCG ) perform woman child bear age ) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
